thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 09 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Unipol Gruppo FY Prelim. Net Premiums Down At EUR 11.26 Bln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Unipol Gruppo FY Prelim. Net Premiums Down At EUR 11.26 Bln
text:
Feb 9 (Reuters) - UNIPOL GRUPPO SPA:
* FY PRELIM NET PREMIUMS EUR 11.26 BILLION VERSUS EUR 13.79 BILLION YEAR AGO
* FY PRELIM NET LOSS (GROUP SHARE) EUR 345.8 MILLION VERSUS PROFIT EUR 329.6 MILLION YEAR AGO
* FY PRELIM ADJUSTED CONSOLIDATED NET PROFIT OF EUR 655 MILLION WITHOUT ONE-OFF EFFECTS OF RESTRUCTURING PLAN
* EXPECTED DIVIDEND OF EUR 0.18 PER SHARE * BANKING BUSINESS RESTRUCTURING CONCLUDED: GOOD BANK IN OPERATION FROM FEB 1 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
